cards.title: The Shelled One
setup: Put {TheShelledOne} into play, '[b]YOU WILL LEARN DISCIPLINE[/b]' side up. Put all Pods from the villain deck under this card. Put each Strike and a random Umpire from the villain deck into play. Set each Strike's HP to 0. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Strikes are indestructible and immune to damage. Cards under this card are indestructible.
Villain Ongoing cards and environment cards with no printed HP or a printed HP of less than 6 have a maximum HP of 6.
At the end of the villain turn, each environment target deals each hero target 1 psychic damage. Then, play the top card of the environment deck.
When there are 4 tokens on this card, flip this card.
cards.advanced: Whenever a Strike causes a token to be put on this card, remove that Strike from the game.
flippedGameplay: When {TheShelledOne} flips to this side...{BR}... remove all Strikes from the game.{BR}... search the villain deck and trash for {GiantPeanutShell} and put it into play.{BR}... reveal all cards from under this one. Put a random Pitcher and a random Batter from among them into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.
{GiantPeanutShell} is indestructible. The hero next to it gains the keyword [i]Pod[/i].
The first time a Pod is discarded from the villain deck each turn, put that Pod into play.
The second time a Weather Effect enters play each turn, search the villain deck and trash for {AxelTrololol}, put him into play, and shuffle the villain trash into its deck.

At the end of the villain turn, discard cards from the top of the villain deck until you discard a Weather Effect. Put that Weather Effect into play. Then, {TheShelledOne} regains HP equal to the number of non-character villain targets in play.

cards.title: Alejandro Leaf
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1. X on this card = the number of tokens on this card.

The first time any villain target is dealt damage each turn, put a token on this card. Then, if X is 3 or less, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP X melee damage. Otherwise, this card deals each hero target X toxic damage and is put on the bottom of the villain deck.
cards.flavorReference: The Shelled One, Season 10 Day X

cards.title: Axel Trololol
body: At the end of the villain turn, each player discards the top card of their deck in turn order. If the discarded card is a One-Shot, that player's hero may use a power now. Otherwise, this card deals that player's hero 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorReference: The Shelled One, Season 9 Day X

cards.title: Blooddrain
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Weather Effects.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy {H - 1} hero Ongoing cards. Whenever a card is destroyed this way, 1 villain target with less than its maximum HP regains 1 HP.
cards.flavorText: The skies shift.{BR}The drain begins to gurgle.

cards.title: Dan-Peanut Replacement
body: When this card enters play, move it next to the hero with the most cards in hand. Reduce damage dealt by that hero to villain targets by 1.
At the end of that hero's turn, if {TheShelledOne} is a target, discard cards from the villain deck until a Pod is discarded.
cards.flavorText: [b]MY PROGENY{BR}MY PODS{BR}HONOR THEM TO HONOR ME[/b]

cards.title: Feedback
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Weather Effects.

At the start of the villain turn, destroy {H - 1} Equipment cards. If fewer than {H - 1} cards were destroyed this way, replace the hero character card with the highest HP with a variant of that hero.
cards.flavorText: The skies shift.{BR}A deafening noise rings.

cards.title: Forbidden Book
body: Whenever a player discards a card from their hand, this card regains 1 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, each player may discard a card. Then, if this card has {H * 2} or more HP, put a token on {TheShelledOne} and set this card's HP to 0.

body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1. X on this card = the number of tokens on this card.

cards.flavorReference: The Shelled One, Season 9 Day X

cards.title: Giant Peanut Shell
body: When this card enters play, move it next to the hero with the highest HP. That hero must skip either their play or power phase each turn.

At the end of that player's turn, if {TheShelledOne} is a target, that hero deals each other hero target 1 toxic damage. Then, if {Feedback} or {Reverb} is in play, you may move this card next to the previous hero in turn order.
cards.flavorText: A big peanut crashes into the{BR}field, encasing Wyatt Quitter!

cards.title: Idolatry
body: At the end of the villain turn, if this card has {H * 2} or more HP, put a token on {TheShelledOne} and set this card's HP to 0.
Whenever a player causes another player to draw a card, play a card, or use a power, this card regains 1 HP.
Heroes gain the following power:
powers: Destroy 1 of your non-character cards. Another player draws 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: [b]YOU WORSHIP THEM{BR}WHEN I WALK AMONG YOU?[/b]

cards.title: Lots of Birds
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Weather Effects.

At the start of the villain turn, the hero with the second highest HP may have the environment deal them {H + 1} projectile damage. If that hero takes damage this way, destroy a villain Ongoing card and the environment deals {TheShelledOne} 4 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: The skies shift.{BR}The birds swarm the air.

cards.title: Peanut Fraud
body: Whenever damage that would be dealt to a hero target is reduced, this card regains 1 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, if this card has {H} or more HP, put a token on {TheShelledOne} and set this card's HP to 0.

cards.title: Peanuts
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Weather Effects.
Increase damage dealt by Pods by 1.

At the start of the villain turn, each player may discard a card. If fewer than {H} cards were discarded this way, search the villain deck and trash for {GiantPeanutShell} and put it into play, then shuffle the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: The skies shift.{BR}Peanuts begin to fly.

cards.title: Pitching Machine
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1. X on this card = the number of tokens on this card.

The first time any villain target is dealt damage each turn, put a token on this card. Then, if X is 3 or less, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP X melee damage. Otherwise, this card deals each hero target X toxic damage and is put on the bottom of the villain deck.
cards.flavorReference: The Shelled One, Season 9 Day X

cards.title: Pity
body: When a hero character would be reduced to 0 or fewer HP, restore them to their maximum HP instead and destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1 and remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: [b]WHERE IS YOUR SPIRIT{BR}HERE{BR}HAVE SOME OF MINE[/b]
cards.flavorReference: The Shelled One, Season 9 Day X

cards.title: Reverb
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Weather Effects.
At the start of each player's turn, discard the top card of their deck. If a One-Shot is discarded this way, that player skips their power phase this turn and uses a power immediately.
cards.flavorText: The skies shift.{BR}A wave washes over the plane.

cards.title: Solar Eclipse
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Weather Effects. Then, if there are no Umpires in play, put the Umpire with the lowest HP from the villain trash into play.
If there are any Umpires in play, this card is indestructible.
At the start of the villain turn, each Umpire deals the hero target with the highest HP {H + 2} fire damage.

cards.title: The Grand Unslam
body: Players may play an additional card, use an additional power, and draw an additional card during their turns.

At the start of the villain turn, each non-hero target regains {H} HP and the non-hero target with the highest HP deals each hero target 4 infernal damage. Then, play the top card of the villain deck and remove this card from the game.

cards.title: The Monitor Approaches
body: Play the top card of the villain deck.
If {TheShelledOne} is a target, it deals itself 5 melee damage and plays the top card of the villain deck. Otherwise, put a token on {TheShelledOne} and shuffle this card into the villain deck.

cards.title: The Necromancy
body: When this card enters play, put the top card of each hero trash on top of its deck.
At the end of the villain turn, the hero with the highest HP deals the hero with the second lowest HP {H - 1} fire damage.

cards.title: The Snackrifice
body: Hero cards cannot be played.
At the start of the villain turn, the non-hero target with the highest HP deals each hero target 3 sonic damage. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: [b]YOU WITHHOLD YOUR LABOR?{BR}YOU THINK THAT GIVES YOU POWER?[/b]

cards.title: Tribute to the Hall
body: At the end of the villain turn, each player reveals the top card of their deck. They may discard it or remove it from the game. If {H} cards are removed from the game this way, this card regains 1 HP. Then, if this card has 2 or more HP, put a token on {TheShelledOne} and set this card's HP to 0.

cards.title: Umpire Littleman
body: The first time {TheShelledOne} would be dealt damage each turn, reduce that damage by 1.
The first time an environment target would be dealt damage each turn, if {TheShelledOne} is not a target, reduce that damage by 1.

cards.title: Umpire Steel
body: The first time {TheShelledOne} would be dealt damage each turn, reduce that damage by 1.
The first time an environment target would be dealt damage each turn, if {TheShelledOne} is not a target, reduce that damage by 1.
